description: A man sits at a table in a dining establishment, eating a meal, while a dinner fork is impaled in the crown of his head. Despite this bizarre injury, he continues to eat, seemingly unconcerned. A nearby figure dressed in clown-like attire sits uncomfortably at another table, observing the scene or perhaps just present in this strange environment. The presence of a chef and other diners suggests a restaurant setting, amplifying the absurdity of the man's condition within a normal social context. The literal depiction of a metaphorical phrase creates dark humor and surrealism.
